author: Swathi ᴰᵃᵈᵃ❤️ᵒᵒʳᵏᵘʳᵘᵛⁱ🕊️
text:
Living in join family going to live in join family 🙂

I practiced to be alone even in crowd..
Practiced to Become more silent in every hard situation
Practiced mind voices a lot..
Practiced not to ask anything to anyone even if needed.

These are minor things :) https://t.co/rwltN3RqwU
